title: Questions Emerge About The Paul Pelosi Attack (Ep 1884)
description:
In this episode, I address the emerging questions about the attack on Paul Pelosi. 

News Picks:


The Paul Pelosi story makes no sense. 


Recycling doesn’t work. 

Twitter is going to charge for a blue check mark.



Herschel Walker destroys Barack Obama after Obama makes a series of dumb comments.
